entry.title: AI and Python for Financial Data Analysis with NLP
entry.summary:
Description

In this session, we will dive into analyzing financial data using Python and Artificial Intelligence (AI), focusing on Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques. This session will cover various methods to process and analyze financial data, along with how NLP can be leveraged to improve financial data analysis.

Kim Daehyun â€¦
entry.content:
Description

In this session, we will dive into analyzing financial data using Python and Artificial Intelligence (AI), focusing on Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques. This session will cover various methods to process and analyze financial data, along with how NLP can be leveraged to improve financial data analysis.

Kim Daehyun Hello, I am a data scientist with a focus on AI and NLP. I have experience working with various types of data, including financial datasets. I hope this session helps you understand how to apply Python and AI to financial data analysis.
